title: Powershell: Show Current Users
desc: Displays all currently logged in users (Requires admin if run if run in powershell 5 and below)

title: Powershell: Show All Users
desc: Displays all users disabled/enabled (Some information may be hidden when not run as admin)

title: Powershell: View Logins
desc: Displays recent logins, password changes, and other relevant security events (requires administrator permissions)
